factText: State Highway 1.👉 Milton to Clinton via Balclutha is experiencing surface flooding but remains open although from Clinton to Gore is closed due to flooding. All flooded roads need to be treated as closed. State Highway 90.👉 The road south of Tapanui is currently closed to flooding.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-011_Flood_Which roads and bridges have been closed due to flooding?

factText: State Highway 6.👉 Frankton to Lumsden via Kingston is currently closed to flooding State Highway 85.👉 Alexandra to Kyeburn Due to surface flooding, caution is advised along this route State Highway 8.👉 Roxburgh, at Slaughterhouse Creek Road is closed due to Flooding #FRIENDLYNOTE.. ROADS CLOSED Please do NOT drive down closed roads. The police are managing this road closure.

Latest from Clutha District, which is now under a state of emergency due to flooding. Clutha District Weather Update #5 - 4 February 2020 at 11:30pm Mayor Bryan Cadogan has declared a State of Emergency covering the Clutha District, due to widespread flooding.

The concern for flash flooding continues to increase as we look ahead to the likelihood of multiple hours of heavy rain setting up for Wednesday and Thursday. Minor flooding is currently forecast in the Green and Kentucky watersheds, as well as in the lower Ohio River, but flooding could also impact the Upper Cumberland watershed and New River depending on the location of heaviest rainfall.
NWS Mobile notes that coastal communities and areas that are more urban have a slightly greater flash flood risk compared to communities farther inland.
The National Weather Service in Mobile will likely issue a Flash Flood Watch for northwest Florida in the hours ahead.
Gore residents - If you are in one of the identified evacuation areas, please EVACUATE NOW.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-011_general_Where can displaced people find emergency housing?

factText: RUNOFF FROM THIS RAIN WILL CAUSE AREA CREEKS AND STREAMS TO RISE AND REMAIN HIGH THURSDAY AND FRIDAY, WITH LARGER RIVERS RISING ON FRIDAY AND SATURDAY.
Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. &&. You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-011_Flood_What emergency measures are in place to prevent further flooding?

factText: This rainfall may result in flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas. Heavier areas of rain are currently happening near Creola, Saraland, Satsuma, Bay Minette, the Dolly Parton Bridge, and much of the I-65 corridor in Mobile and Baldwin counties. @marcuslush Flooded from Milton south.

STATE HIGHWAYS CLOSED SH93 Clinton to Mataura CLOSED SH1 Clinton to Gore CLOSED SH90 Gore to Tapanui CLOSED Other Roads Barnego Rd is closed at the Balclutha Bridge due to water spilling over the flood banks.
Unfortunately damage to this road means that it is closed to all but residents on essential business only.
Road update as of 0900 6/2/2020 Now includes Local and council roads REOPENED ROADS SH 1 Gore to Clinton OPEN but expect delays SH 97 Mossburn to SH6 intersection OPEN,
We assist when there is a hoarding, or an overwhelmed owner.
